Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix medicine ''Taken Late'' status when medicine taken early

The mark_taken() method was comparing UTC-stored taken_at time against 
a naive local scheduled time, causing medicines taken BEFORE the 
scheduled time to be incorrectly marked as "Taken Late".

For example: 8:24 AM EST = 1:24 PM UTC. When stripped of timezone, 
"1:24 PM" > "10:00 AM" (scheduled + grace), so marked as late.

Fixed by converting taken_at to user''s local timezone before comparing.
Also fixed was_on_time and minutes_late properties with same issue.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Twilio Error 21212 - Add phone number validation and normalization

Problem: SMS sends were failing with Twilio Error 21212 (Invalid ''From'' number)
because TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER wasn''t validated or normalized to E.164 format.

Solution:
- Added _normalize_phone_number() to TwilioService that:
  - Removes formatting chars (spaces, dashes, parens, dots)
  - Adds +1 prefix for 10-digit US numbers
  - Validates against E.164 regex pattern
- Phone normalization at service init AND for destination numbers
- Detailed error logging showing From/To values on failures
- Specific error messages for Twilio 21212/21211 errors

Files modified:
- apps/sms/services.py - Phone normalization and error handling
- apps/sms/tests/test_sms_comprehensive.py - 6 new tests (46 total)
- docs/wlj_claude_changelog.md - Documented fix
- docs/wlj_claude_features.md - Added Phone Number Normalization section

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Admin Project Tasks - Phase 4 Task Execution

Phase 4 adds minimal logic for controlled task execution using status updates:

Status Transition Rules:
- backlog -> ready
- ready -> in_progress
- in_progress -> done | blocked
- blocked -> ready
- done -> (terminal, no transitions)

Validation Rules:
- Task can only move to in_progress if phase is active
- Task cannot move to done unless it was in_progress
- Blocked tasks require a reason

New API Endpoint:
- PATCH /api/admin/project/tasks/<id>/status/
- Admin-only with full validation and activity logging

Model Changes:
- TaskStatusTransitionError exception
- ALLOWED_TRANSITIONS mapping
- blocked_reason field
- is_valid_transition(), validate_status_transition(), transition_status() methods

Files:
- apps/admin_console/models.py
- apps/admin_console/views.py (TaskStatusUpdateAPIView, ActivePhaseAPIView)
- apps/admin_console/urls.py
- apps/admin_console/migrations/0005_add_blocked_reason.py
- apps/admin_console/tests/test_admin_console.py (31 new tests)
- docs/wlj_claude_changelog.md

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Admin Project Tasks - Phase 15 Operator Runbook

Adds a contextual help feature for the Projects system:

- New route: GET /admin-console/projects/help/
- Context-aware Help modal integration (shows runbook link only on Projects pages)
- Read-only Operator Runbook with 5 sections:
  1. What the Projects System Is
  2. Daily Operating Workflow (6 steps)
  3. Task Status Meanings (5 statuses)
  4. When Execution Stops (4 conditions)
  5. Golden Rules (5 principles)

Safety: Admin-only, read-only, no data modification, no activity logging
